description: Try our easy to follow Marion's Nasi Goreng recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Marion's Nasi Goreng Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: skewers: 1 chicken breast fillet, cut into cubes
satay sauce: 200ml light & creamy evaporated milk

recipeInstructions.text: Combine skewer ingredients in a bowl. Thread chicken onto skewers. Set aside.

Make satay sauce; stir milk, essence, powder and fish sauce in a saucepan over medium heat until combined. Simmer for 5 minutes. Add peanut butter and continue to stir for 5 minutes. Add sugar and 1 tbs of water. Cook, stirring until thick.
Make fried rice; heat oil in wok over high heat. Add garlic and chilli and stir for 2-3 seconds, Add rice and veg. Toss well until golden. Add sauce and coriander and toss through. Remove from heat.

Cook skewers on a preheated barbecue. Spoon rice into ramekins, pressing down, then turn out in centre of bowls. Top with egg, skewers, satay sauce, prawns, sambal, crackers, coconut, cucumber and tomato.
